channel.title: CVE Feed for Go standard library -- crypto/rand
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go standard library -- crypto/rand

item.title: CVE-2022-30634|2024-08-03T06:56:13.255Z -- go%20standard%20library -- crypto%2Frand
item.description: Infinite loop in Read in crypto/rand before Go 1.17.11 and Go 1.18.3 on Windows allows attacker to cause an indefinite hang by passing a buffer larger than 1 << 32 - 1 bytes.
